hepb_recombivax.name: Recombivax HB
hepb_recombivax.description: Hepatitis B vaccine for prevention of infection caused by all known subtypes of hepatitis B virus. Approved for all ages. 3-dose series (0.5 mL for children 0-19 years) given at 0, 1, and 6 months.

hib_hiberix.name: Hiberix
hib_hiberix.description: Haemophilus b Conjugate Vaccine (Tetanus Toxoid Conjugate) for prevention of invasive disease caused by H. influenzae type b. Approved for children 6 weeks through 4 years. 4-dose series at 2, 4, 6, and 15-18 months of age.

mmr_mmrii.name: M-M-R II
mmr_mmrii.description: Measles, Mumps, and Rubella Virus Vaccine Live (RA 27/3 strain) for prevention of measles, mumps, and rubella. Originally licensed September 1978. Source document is 1978 FDA FOIA clinical trial summary.
